title: NBA draft, Zion Williamson, Knicks, and the Warriors
itunes:title: NBA draft, Zion Williamson, Knicks, and the Warriors
description:
It's NBA draft day and Colin explains what the New York Knicks should do if they get the number 1 pick, why Duke F Zion Williamson is valuable, what to expect from the Golden State Warriors in the Western Conference Finals, and who his top 10 sport families are. Guests include Chris Broussard, Bill Raftery, Chis Haynes, and Rick Barry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
